issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Description

The purpose of this API is to create a native grouped view in iPhone. This is a pure native view and it will be treated similar to createWindow (in that it will have the same properties and functions available to it). In other words, it is not associated with an HTML page.

Example

// create grouped view  
var groupedView = Titanium.UI.iPhone.createGroupedView();
groupedView.addSection(optionSection);
groupedView.addSection(buttonSection);
groupedView.addSection(inputSection);`
groupedView.open({animated:true});

API Arguments

No arguments

API Functions

addSection : add a section to a grouped view

open : open the grouped view

{html}
